title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\LocalizedObjectAnnotation
name: LocalizedObjectAnnotation
description:
Set of detected objects with bounding boxes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.LocalizedObjectAnnotation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.mid
params.description: Object ID that should align with EntityAnnotation mid.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: The BCP-47 language code, such as "en-US" or "sr-Latn". For more information, see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unicode_locale_identifier.

params.name: data.bounding_poly
params.description: Image region to which this object belongs. This must be populated.
